SELECT BM.MNM AS MNM, BM.MNO AS MNO, BM.TEL AS TEL, BM.EMAIL AS EMAIL FROM BIT_MEMBS BM JOIN BIT_TCHS BT ON BM.MNO=BT.TNO
MNM like concat('%', #{MNM}, '%') and tel like concat('%', #{tel}, '%') and email like concat('%', #{email}, '%')
order by
title asc title desc MNO asc MNO desc
limit #{startIndex}, #{length}
mapper.insert: insert into bit_membs(MNM, TEL, email, PWD) values(#{MNM}, #{TEL}, #{email}, #{PWD})
insert into bit_tchs(tno) values((select max(mno) from bit_membs))
